long_description: Whether you're a cyclocross veteran or just getting started, the Scott CX Comp Bike is built for rugged speed to help you get your 'cross groove on. Double-butted 7005 aluminum frame efficiently transfers pedaling power to the drivetrain while offering great handling performance and easy carries; carbon fork reduces weight. 'Cross-specific Shimano FC-CX50 crankset is paired with a 105 rear derailleur and other dependable Shimano components to ensure precise performance within the 20 speeds. Tektro CX cantilever brakes supply powerful braking in sloppy conditions and clear mud efficiently; cartridge pads are easily replaceable. Schwalbe Rocket Ron tires deliver traction in sloppy, muddy conditions. Cables are routed across the top of the top tube for minimal interference from mud and on run-ups. Specs on the Scott CX Comp Bike are subject to change.
